item.title: Fly-tipping inside and outside private bin store at Well Court, off Adit Road, 15th August
item.description:
The private bin store at Well Court (off Adit Road) is being used by non-residents to dispose of household waste, cardboard packaging, and large items such as furniture. These items are being left both inside the bin store itself and outside the bin store doors, including near the road-facing entrance used for refuse collection. Some of the discarded packaging clearly shows addresses linked to nearby properties on Adit Road and surrounding streets. This has been an ongoing issue and poses both hygiene and fire safety concerns. The bin store is for the exclusive use of Well Court residents, and this misuse constitutes fly-tipping on private property. I am reporting this for investigation and appropriate enforcement.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Adit Road, Northumberland Heath, Erith, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Awaiting drain repair. Driveway blocked, 15th August
item.description:
The drain was recently replaced (badly) outside 245 Kent House Road. I reported this soon after installation as tarmac began collapsing and crumbling into the drain itself. The problem has got worse and you’ve now fenced off the drain as it’s forming a sinkhole. However there seems to be no sign of work and you’re blocking access to my property

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kent House Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic Bullard has been removed along with its padlock, 15th August
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Nevill Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Daily fly tipping on fassett square, 15th August
item.description:
People are dumping household items daily on the side of my flat. The council are picking it up everyday so people are continuing to do it. It looks awful and very upsetting to see it every day. Please can we get a sign that states it’s an offense?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Graham Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
